GSD.product_version: versions from v5.10 to before v5.15.75
GSD.description:
tracing: Fix reading strings from synthetic events

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.75 by commit d9c79fbcbdb6cb10c07c85040eaf615180b26c48, it was introduced in version v5.10 by commit bd82631d7ccdc894af2738e47abcba2cb6e7dea9. For more details please see the references link.
